2099470.name: 十三月のふたり姫 Demo
2099470.description:
This is the demo version of the visual novel "The 13th Month".
You can play the first two chapters of the story for free.

◆“Sleeping Beauty”？
The fate of the world is bound to a princess lost in an endless sleep… The famous fairy tale “Sleeping Beauty” is completely reimagined and redesigned… With a demonic imagination and originality, the creators will lead you through a fantastic and illusionary world…
2099470.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
